description: Space expansion without money or laws. A new state of mind.
mission_text: We are creating a new form of civilization no money, no hierarchy, no laws.
Only reason, trust, and the drive toward stars.
This is not utopia. This is the engineering of the future.
principles_list: No money resources are distributed by need and meaning.
No laws behavior is regulated by reason and trust.
join_text: We are looking for engineers, philosophers, dreamers.
Join the discussion, propose ideas, help build.
made_with: Made with faith in the future.
